PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12172023-12-08PSPC
ActFederal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Act
SubjectFederal Prompt Payment for Construction Work Regulations (Criteria, Time Limits, Interest and Circumstances)
PrecisFEDERAL PROMPT PAYMENT FOR CONSTRUCTION WORK REGULATIONS (CRITERIA, TIME LIMITS, INTEREST AND CIRCUMSTANCES) in order to (1) define the criteria for the designation of provinces that have a reasonably similar prompt payment and adjudication regime; and (2) outline the time limits, interests and circumstances of the adjudication process.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0269 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: FEDERAL PROMPT PAYMENT FOR CONSTRUCTION WORK REGULATIONS (CRITERIA, TIME LIMITS, INTEREST AND CIRCUMSTANCES) in order to (1) define the criteria for the designation of provinces that have a reasonably similar prompt payment and adjudication regime; and (2) outline the time limits, interests and circumstances of the adjudication process.
